Package org.neo4j.counts

Interface CountsStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, ConsistencyCheckable, CountsAccessor, CountsVisitor.Visitable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CountsStore.NullCountsStore, GBPTreeCountsStore
    public interface CountsStore
extends CountsAccessor, AutoCloseable, ConsistencyCheckable
    Store and accessor of entity counts. Counts changes revolves around one or a combination of multiple tokens and are applied as deltas. This makes it necessary to tie all changes to transaction ids so that this store can tell whether or not to re-apply any given set of changes during recovery. Changes are applied by making calls to CountsAccessor.Updater from apply(long, PageCursorTracer).

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        CountsAccessor.Updater apply​(long txId,
                             PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
        Parameters:
        txId - id of the transaction that produces the changes that are being applied.
        cursorTracer - underlying page cursor tracer
        Returns:
        an updater where count deltas are being applied onto.

      • close

        void close()
        Closes this counts store so that no more changes can be made and no more counts can be read.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable

      • start

        void start​(PageCursorTracer cursorTracer,
           MemoryTracker memoryTracker)
    throws IOException
        Puts the counts store in started state, i.e. after potentially recovery has been made. Any changes apply(long, PageCursorTracer) applied} before this call is made are considered recovery repairs from a previous non-clean shutdown.
        Throws:
        IOException - any type of error happening when transitioning to started state.
